metadata.category: Building a Haptic Feedback App with CoreHaptics
metadata.title: Custom Haptic Design

inlineContent.text: Learn how to design and implement unique haptic signatures
Clearly define the purpose of haptics.
Document what message each haptic conveys.
Good haptic design isn’t just about making things “feel”
but conveying meaning and providing consistent experiences.
Map haptic parameters to emotions or situations.
Transform abstract emotions into concrete patterns.
Combine low intensity, low sharpness, and long duration.
Deliver impact with high intensity and sharpness.
A pattern that imprints the brand when the app starts.
Distinguish your app with a notification signature.
Design a unique pattern that differentiates from other apps.
Let’s create a unique “signature” haptic for your app.
Memorable patterns used at app launch,
major action completion, and special events.
Good signatures are short, distinctive, and evoke the brand.
Create a haptic tester view for
Add debug UI that can adjust
multiple pattern versions for A/B testing.
Iterative testing is essential for haptic design.
Test in various situations on real devices
Check how it feels in pocket/hand
According to Apple HIG, what is the most important
Excessive haptics cause user fatigue and
dilute the meaning of important feedback.
Use purposefully and respect user preferences.
Use strong haptics to get user attention
Strong haptics are only suitable for warnings.
What is the role of “signature haptics” in haptic design?
Imprint the brand and differentiate the app
are tools to increase brand recognition.
The purpose of haptics is to improve user experience,

abstract.text: Build interactive haptic systems suitable for games
and learn how to create immersive gaming experiences.
Understand the core concepts of the CoreHaptics framework and
how the iPhone’s Taptic Engine works.
Understand the Apple Haptic Audio Pattern (AHAP) file format
and learn how to collaborate with designers to manage haptics.
Learn how to combine various haptic events with CHHapticPattern
to create meaningful feedback.
